TITLE: Housing Platform
NAME: Name:
WILLKOMMEN: Welcome to the digital housing platform
WELCOME_TEXT: Together for more housing in Lemgo!
DESCRIPTION: We are happy to have you here! Our platform was developed to connect students and landlords in Lemgo and reduce vacant housing. Whether you are offering an empty apartment or looking for a new home – you will find everything you need here:
NO_OFFERS_FOUND: No offers found that match your budget.
LIST_ITEM_1: Housing listings: Discover available apartments in Lemgo.
LIST_ITEM_2: Viewing appointments: Schedule viewings online with ease.
LIST_ITEM_3: Digital rental agreement: Sign your contract quickly and securely.
LIST_ITEM_4: Networking made easy: Connect with other tenants and become part of the community.
FINAL_TEXT: Together, we create a vibrant and future-oriented housing situation in Lemgo. Start today!

CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: We are here for you! Use our contact form to send us your inquiries. We will get back to you as soon as possible. We look forward to your message!
